flawed_nl_solution:
The patch is 16*20=<<16*20=320>>320 square feet
So he needs 320/4=<<320/4=80>>80 patches
The first 10 patches cost 10*10=$10*10=1000>>1000
He gets a discount on the next 80-10=<<80-10=70>>70 patches
They each cost 10/2=$10/2=5>>5
So in total they cost 70*5=$70*5=350>>350
That means in total he paid 1000+350=$1000+350=1350>>1350
#### 1350

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 100, not 1000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
